1.0.name: wordpress/embed-google-map
1.0.description:
Embed Google Map is a plugin for embedding one or more Google Maps to WordPress posts and pages. Adding maps is very simple, just add the address or the coordinates which location you want to show an a map inside google_map tags to a post or a page, and that's it! It's possible to define the type of the map (normal, satellite, hybrid, terrain), the size of the map, the language of the Google Maps interface, zoom level, border width and link to the full size map. The default settings defined in the admin panel are used for all the maps in the site, and they can be overridden for individual maps.

Features

  • It's possible to embed one or more Google Maps within a post/page.
  • The address or the coordinates which location is shown on a map is given as a parameter.
  • Define the language of the Google Maps interface.
  • Define the type of the map (normal, satellite, hybrid, terrain).
  • Define the size of the map.
  • Define the zoom
